description: Aspose.OCR for .NET is a character and optical mark recognition component built to allow developers to add OCR and OMR functionality in their ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It provides a simple set of classes for controlling character and optical mark recognition
releaseNotes:
New Features
OCR-34284 Create Busy Indicator for Template Editor

Enhancements
OCR-34314 Exception while trying to save Preprocessed Binarized Image [.Net]
OCR-34308 Minimum height of CheckBox element in the OMR template editor issue [.Net]
OCR-34299 Extra Undo operation appears after creating Horizontal oriented Choice box or Grid element
OCR-34279 Exception occurs when using OCR for Java
OCR-34251 Unable to perform OCR operation on transparent images [.Net]
OCR-34301 The message "Selected area out of bitmap bounds" should be thrown when the selected area is out of bitmap
OCR-34295 Verify Aspose.OCR namespaces conform to Microsoft guidelines

Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes
The following is a list of any changes made to the public API such as added, renamed, removed or deprecated members as well as any non-backward compatible change made to Aspose.OCR for .NET. If you have concerns about any change listed, please raise it on the Aspose.OCR support forum.

Added APIs:
Class Aspose.OCR.TextPartLevel
Field/Enum Aspose.OCR.TextPartLevel.Character
Field/Enum Aspose.OCR.TextPartLevel.Line
Field/Enum Aspose.OCR.TextPartLevel.Textblock
Field/Enum Aspose.OCR.TextPartLevel.Word

Removed APIs:
Class Aspose.OCR.RecognizedText.TextPartInfo.TextPartLevel
Field/Enum Aspose.OCR.RecognizedText.TextPartInfo.TextPartLevel.Character
Field/Enum Aspose.OCR.RecognizedText.TextPartInfo.TextPartLevel.Line
Field/Enum Aspose.OCR.RecognizedText.TextPartInfo.TextPartLevel.Textblock
Field/Enum Aspose.OCR.RecognizedText.TextPartInfo.TextPartLevel.Word
summary: Aspose.OCR for .NET is a character and optical mark recognition component built to allow developers to add OCR and OMR functionality in their .NET applications
title: Aspose.OCR for .NET
